original_text: All those men were brave soldiers and they became officers in David's army. They helped David to fight against the enemy's soldiers when they attacked.
korean_text: 이 무리가 다윗을 도와 도둑 떼를 쳤으니 그들은 다 큰 용사요 군대 지휘관이 됨이었더라

sentences.original_text: All those men were brave soldiers
and they became officers in David's army
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 다윗의 군대에서 장교가 되었습니다

sentences.original_text: They helped David to fight against the enemy's soldiers
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 다윗이 적의 군인들과 싸우는 것을 도왔습니다
